topic.title: å¤‡ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡è®ºå› alternative chinese language message board
public id submission
topic.body: don't submit with public ids, or people may remove it. list also at: github.com/mogical/znpubid

topic.title: submission sample and about public id maintainers
topic.body:
```
master_seed=put_the_master_seed_here
id=if it has several ids, separate with ";"
creator=if the creator could not be found, use "bad@zeroid.bit"
maintainer=if there is no maintainer, use "bad@zeroid.bit"
```
a maintainer's job is to manually backup the content of the public id and restore it when people tries to delete the content of the public id or spam with it.

this page is also avalible at:
gfwtalk(chinese): http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:20_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1/+id
zerotalk(english): http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:1551176935_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1/public+id+submission
GitHub(clearnet): https://github.com/hex3c/znpubid

have a nice day : )

topic.title: dumping data dir (which contains a lot of zites) into a git repo
topic.body:
i'm going to dump my /path/to/zn/data dir to a git repo (like [this](https://github.com/ZnCl2/NewGFWTalk.bit.archive)) so that one can download a lot of zites simply by extracting the dump and click update all sites instead of adding sites one by one or using scripts, also, using a git repo helps recovering fucked up sites.

what will be included in the dump:
- all sites available on the z.hex3.cf proxy
- sites.json

what will NOT be included in the dump:
- videos, pictures, and optional files (these wont be dumped because they are binary files which doesnt get along quite well with git, and you can easily download them by clicking update all sites)
- users.json and other setting files on my server (of course not, or you will know my masterseed( Í¡Â° ÍœÊ– Í¡Â°)
- porn sites (read [this thread](?Topic:1553079752_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1) for reasons)
- .db files (because they should be generated instead of being downloaded)

to zite owners:
as you have uploaded your site into the zeronetwork and considering how zn works, i assume that you grant anyone the permission to download and publicly redistribute anything in your site.
but it's okay to require me to not include your site in the dump. if you want so, you have about 3 days to contact me using my e-mail or comment this post, and this also results your site being removed from my server.
however, remember that once the git commit is made, one CANNOT undo it. you can ask me to stop dumping your site anymore and i'll remove it and stop dumping it, but i will not be able to delete old versions in the dump.

to check if your site will be included, simply check if it's available on z.hex3.cf
to add your site, simply open z.hex3.cf/addressofyourzite

i will start the dumping process at about 4:44 a.m. (UTC) on apr 4 (this thursday), please contact me asap BEFORE that time if you want remove your site. (i surly wont check my mail box at a second before the deadline ðŸ™ƒ)

contacts: (please speak english or chinese, or i will use google translator, which usually leads to misunderstandings)
email: hex3c@outlook.com
pgp: 0x428df46623333333

have a nice dayðŸ™‚

1553079752_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26c.body:
> [satoxyn1](#comment_23_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): Try to set the following before running ZeroNet, it may help on OpenVZ:ulimit -s 1024

i gonna try it

> [satoxyn1](#comment_23_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): Try to set the following before running ZeroNet, it may help on OpenVZ:ulimit -s 1024

sadly, not working for meðŸ˜­
i runned `ulimit -s 768` and zeronet still eats up about 900M of memory and still crashes due to insufficient memory.
(a run-out-of-memory crash can be triggered with [Horizon](/1CjMsvhJ2JsV4B5qo3FDHnF3mvRCcHuxBn/))

> [kai0](#comment_1007_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): Is this the I2P technology used? I am accessing your server. Can my computer be a temporary node?

nope. i'm not using i2p. and your computer will **not** be a temporary node if you just visit my server. you have to run zeronet on your computer to make a node. my server just delivers zeronet contents to your browser, and that's why we call it a proxy.

btw, please speak english here. if you can't speak english, [google transltor (which is available in china)](https://translate.google.cn/) may be helpful for you.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_741_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): I have proxy too, ram usage also 1GB for 3K sites. [...]

i'm planning to upgrade my vps to 2gb ram when my salary day arrivesðŸ˜¹

> [kai0](#comment_1008_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): My site is stuck on your server and has not been updated since 7th. Can you delete it and resynchronize it? With this server is good, I can verify the synchronization status of the site. http://127.0.0.1:43110/16EwXiGi4Dn9EZFSeEuKc2HNZYRD3RcVDs/

you don't have to redownload the site. just click the update button in the sidebar. maybe it didn't update because your port isn't open. please make sure your port is open or use tor.

also, **please speak *english* here**. otherwise, people who don't understand chinese will not be able to read your comments. you may want to go to the [chinese msg board](/NewGFWTalk.bit) if you speak chinese.

> [bvn13](#comment_1_19eXfGkykvbJgB7fb4TPYTkxWmuNTxeRMJ): I have restarted you "proxy". And here is your masterseed: 058fbbbd6ed13511a78aee9283491f0ed40dd8fd497129f263ed1425f9ccb7ad

you can shut it down, but it seems that it will restart automatically

and maybe `058fbbbd6ed13511a78aee9283491f0ed40dd8fd497129f263ed1425f9ccb7ad` is your master seed or yet another randomly generated one, because mine is `60****ee`. sorry to disappoint you, it you are trying to cheat me of giving my real master seed to you Â¯\\\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯

> [krixano](#comment_703_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): Btw, there's a zeronet setting to disallow this (the restarting/shutting down of zeronet, and some other things). I also noticed you are allowing users to pin stuff.

i'll try it

> [pubg](#comment_35_1PqrpogAwPjPf9T7bJjWWAjzTaRQcXLYCR): ä½ æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å°†multiuseræ’ä»¶ä¸­ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç åˆ é™¤äº†ï¼Ÿ [...]

no, i didn't ever changed any code

> [satoxyn1](#comment_28_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): @60, how are you going to handle abuse messages? There were several ZeroNet gateways but they didn't last long generally because of CP and such. [...]

did you mean he died physically or he stopped getting online anymore?

i'm only 17 years old now and i'm very healthy so i think i've got enough years to live

and what do you mean by "abuse messages"? if you mean spamming, i'll ban the masterseed of the spammer from my server

and for the cp metter, they don't really care about zn
many people i know in my life uses anti-censorship tools like i2p or tor and none of them got killed.

> [satoxyn1](#comment_30_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): What I wanted to say is that if you allow every zite on your gateway, sooner or later somebody will open child pornography zites and report links for the images/videos/pages/etc to your hoster. You hoster most probably will suspend or terminate your gateway. [...]

maybe i can try to generate a block list using a porn detector

> [satoxyn1](#comment_31_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): I don't have any public gateways, but I do have a VPN service, which may be compared with a lite version of Tor exit node. Most abuse messages I get are DMCA copyright violations which require little to no action in most jurisdictions. Sometimes I get more serious messages, like someone used VPN to scan RDP servers, hacked into one of them and uploaded a ransomware cryptolocker which encrypted files on the server. [...]

i'm gonna do this by modding the uipassword plugin(however, i gotta go school now)

> [satoxyn1](#comment_32_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): You can just set the homepage, use --homepage CLI flag or set it in zeronet.conf.

by doing so, zerohello wont be able to list sites

> [satoxyn1](#comment_33_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): Huh, why? It works for me.

idk, and do you have something like a porn list?
it's quite complicated to manually pick them out and block them

> [satoxyn1](#comment_34_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): No, I don't have it. Remember that new porn sites may appear any time.

that's true
i blocked sites by searching "porn" and get a list
however chinese porn sites usually dont have a keywork, for example they are named like "è€å¸æœºç¦åˆ©ç¤¾" or "æ’¸å¤§å¸ˆ" or "é‡å£å‘³æœ¬å­ç½‘" or else, so i'm gonna take a look at every chinese zites on my proxy to find out porn and blacklist it.
after finishing that, i make a poorn list so that other proxy builders will save time a lot in blocking porn

> [satoxyn1](#comment_38_1LGApmQZPN49nawg4HQQgf8ToVUPxGe2Zq): The proxy is broken, 502.

sorry, i was reconfiguring sshd and didnt notice that it triggered a restart when i was logged out. after the restart, zeronet wasnt started but nginx was, so you see a 502.
i've just restarted zn, the 502 should go away now.

i've enabled cloudflare for this proxy to increase the connection speed
however, if cloudflare is blocked in your region, you can go to http://50.3.70.3:2 to connect to zeronet webui directly without going through cloudflare

also announcing a new tracker built with chihaya

https://w.wwwww.wtf:443/announce

that's also how the multiuser plugin works.

1552480101_153dW34Ng5fVUZ5D5NcZRfAbvRQS1.body:
afaik firefox can be trusted for now

the source code is available at https://github.com/mozilla/send , but it can't be guaranteed that the server uses these source codes (maybe the server is prentending to be using these but it actually steals your file)

> everyting you submit to a server is possible to be read by the server owner.
> everything the server gives you is possible to be faked by the server owner.
